Verses: 1 sagala Janangale, Kaikotti Dhevanukku Munbaagak Gempeera Saththamaai Aarppariyungal.
2 unnadhamaanavaraagiya Karththar Bayangaramaanavarum, Boomiyinmeedhengum Magaththuvamaana Raajaavumaayirukkiraar.
3 janangalai Namakku Vasappaduththi, Jaadhigalai Nammudaiya Paadhangalukkuk Keezhppaduththuvaar.
4 thamakkup Piriyamaana Yaakkobin Sirappaana Dhesaththai Namakkuch Sudhandharamaagath Therindhalippaar. (selaa.)
5 dhevan Aarpparippodum, Karththar Ekkaala Saththaththodum Uyara Ezhundharulinaar.
6 dhevanaip Potrip Paadungal, Paadungal; Nammudaiya Raajaavaip Potrip Paadungal, Paadungal.
7 dhevan Boomiyanaiththirkum Raajaa; Karuththudane Avaraip Potrip Paadungal.
8 dhevan Jaadhigalmel Arasaalugiraar; Dhevan Thamadhu Parisuththa Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkiraar.
9 janangalin Pirabukkal Aabiragaamin Dhevanudaiya Janangalaakach Serkkappadugiraargal; Boomiyin Kedagangal Dhevanudaiyavaigal; Avar Magaa Unnadhamaanavar.
